text: nuqmlOca#ntI-cAPsaqrasau# saqrpA hEqti rvyAqGrAH prahE#ti raqya mu#ttaqrAth saMqya~Md- va#suqstasya# sEnaqjicca# suqShENa#Sca sEnAni grAmaqNyau# viqSvAcI# ca GRuqtAcI# cAPsaqrasAq vApO# hEqti rvAtaqH prahE#ti raqyamuqparyaq rvAgva#-suqstasyaq tArkShyaq-ScAri#ShTa-nEmiSca sEnAni grAmaqNyA# vuqrvaSI# ca pUqrvaci#ttiScA-Psaqrasau# viqdyuddhEqtira#-vaqsPUrjaqn prahE#tiq stEByOq namaqstE nO# mRuDayantuq tE yaM - [  ] 8
